name: The Legend Of Twins
description:
Help the twins to make it through the levels.

Made for Mini Jam 30 Gameboy
Limitation: Multiple playable characters

Controls:
Move: WASD
Interact: J

Didn't have much time to work on it this weekend so it is a bit short.

Ps.: The cover is kinda clickbait soooo.... I am sorry ;)
